sentence: The only major Republican candidate in the Ohio Senate race who did not rely on self-financing at all is Josh Mandel, the pro-Trump former Ohio treasurer and Marine Corps veteran.
author: Katherine Huggins
title: Over $560 million in campaign contributions flooded 2022 Senate races in first year of midterm election cycle

sentence: Ohio Former Ohio state treasurer Josh Mandel (L) and author JD Vance (R) are running for the Republican Senate nomination in Ohio.
author: Kayla Epstein
title: These 9 Senate races hold the key to who will control Joe Biden's agenda after the midterm elections in November

sentence: PREVIOUSLY: All Fun And Games Until Ohio GOP Senate Candidate Starts Calling Opponent A 'Pussy' Last month, Republicans Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons almost came to blows at Ohio's Senate GOP primary debate.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Maybe We Are Better Off Without Political Debates
